page.title: 09COMPUTERS.
page.content: From the survey of 50 people that we did,the most popular Home Computer was the ZX Spectrum 48k,and most people used their computer for games.Over half the people we asked actually owned a computer.44% of people asked did not own a computer,32% owned Sinclair Spectrums,4% owned a Commodore,4% owned a Tandy,and 16% owned a BBC Microcomputer.8% of the people surveyed used their computers for programming,and the 92% of the people asked used their computer for Software(Games).The people that said that they did own a computer were mostly teenagers.Out of the adults asked,96% said that they did not own a computer,the 4% that said that they did used theirs for business.Our school (Myers Grove) has 18 BBC Micro Computers with an Econet Network System.
